name: POLSEFEST
description:
2-4 player viking sausage showdown! Welcome to Polsefest!

Polsefest is a 2D pvp game, where vikings fight each other shooting danish red sausages and farting sausage farts...
Call some friends and duke it out in this thrilling weird brawler!

Preferred: xBox 360 controllers

Controls:

  • Movement: LEFT THUMBSTICK
  • Jump: A
  • Shoot sausage: RIGHT TRIGGER
  • Fart: X (Requires 3 sausages)
  • Reset scores: F5
  • Exit Game: ESC

MENU

  • Ready up: A
  • Not ready: X
  • Change skin: Y

Credits:

Programming: Jesper Halfter, Mark Olsen
Art: Frederik Bager, Joachim Gerber

The music is Not made by us, Links below:

8-bit: Trollhammaren - Finntroll

In Waves (8-bit) - Trivium

Finntroll - Jaktens Tid 8-bit

KADK Local Game Jam Awards

  • Best game overall
  • Best graphics
